strings: <se_low>King Trode: Despite the Lord of Darkness's resurrection, things seem remarkably similar to before.
<se_low>King Trode: But the monsters will start to become fiercer soon.<page>King Trode: And when they start attacking in groups, they shan't leave even a single hut standing anywhere in the world!

<se_low>Yangus: It's the royal 'untin' ground up 'ere, ain't it?
I remember comin' 'ere wiv old Prince Charmless.
<se_low>Yangus: Not many good mem'ries from them days, mind.
<se_high>Jessica: Argon lizards don't like the scent of humans, right?

<se_high>Jessica: Does that mean they won't ever attack humans?
You know, no matter how much Rhapthorne stirs up the monsters?
<se_def>Angelo: With the monsters becoming ever more bloodthirsty, isn't it a bit dangerous living this far from civilisation?
<se_high>Red: Are this lot off their rockers? They don't look like they've got nuffin' by the way of proper weapons. Wot if a monster attacks, eh?
<se_low>Morrie: The Argon lizards, they are monsters. Fine monsters, si. But in the end, the power of Rhapthorne is gonna make them go nutty as a panettone!
<se_low>Morrie: These people on the montagna are in danger. We need to wipe the door with the don of the darkness, or they're gonna be toast, ay?
